Articles.Content:
Does anyone agree that there should be some more subtle t shirt designs? I feel that the ones already there are too flashy.

I'd prefer something like the rocket from the KSP logo with just KSP next to it, or similar minimalistic shirts.

I agree... something like this:

Or this?

Also I may just be unfamiliar with how cafepress works but can we get shirts in colors? Grey, dark grey, black, red, blue?

Edited August 23, 2013 by FITorion
If they make a black KSP shirt.... Ill buy one in seconds!
I hate T shirts with text on them. But I would buy one with *just* the KSP rocket logo on it, in a heartbeat.
Yes! (yes, more subtle design; yes black or dark grey options). Although I may be forced to buy a coffee mug right now, this very instant. Who uses mouse pads though?

I've got a KSP mouse pad. The surface where I have to place my mouse is too rough for mousing without it. I also have a KSP coffee mug (and a 3-D Jeb).

I have not purchased a KSP t-shirt because white shirts don't last well for me and I loathe all the other pastel color options. I'd love one with the KSP rocket logo, if the shirt came in grey, black, or navy.

I like the idea of having some sort of subtle reference to the game, not in text, but perhaps in minimalistic imagery. Such as a cracked Kerbal helmet or the crashed "Mun or Bust" Lander from the main menu.

The logo could still be in the corner. Still love the current merchandise though.
FITorion, thats exactly what I was trying to describe, thanks a ton!

Or this?

I would love to have the black meatball shirt. I'd even have to break with tradition and wear a T-shirt to work one day.
Please less all-black t-shirts. Dark and medium grey looks better, also consider deep blues and reds.
I just wish they'd do a mug shaped like the grey Rockomax tanks, and a flask of the big orange ones. That would be cash.

I just wish they'd do a mug shaped like the grey Rockomax tanks, and a flask of the big orange ones. That would be cash.

And the handle has to be a radial decoupler!

And the handle has to be a radial decoupler!

Squad. Make this happen.
This is a really big Necropost, but i would like to see a KSP shirt, with just the logo.
